title: Mid Wales Off-Grid Escape
tagline: No signal, no crowds, pure Wales
suitableFor: Couples or solo travellers seeking peace, quiet, and outdoor activities away from crowds. Those with a reasonable level of fitness who enjoy walking and exploring natural landscapes.
notSuitableFor: Families with young children needing constant entertainment, or anyone seeking a fast-paced, action-packed holiday with readily available amenities and nightlife.

knowBeforeYouGo.weather: Mid Wales weather can be unpredictable. Be prepared for rain even in summer. Check the forecast before you set off.
knowBeforeYouGo.traffic: Traffic can be heavy on weekends and during school holidays, especially on the A470 and A487. Parking at popular locations like Elan Valley can fill up quickly â€“ arrive early.
knowBeforeYouGo.booking: Accommodation should be booked in advance, especially during peak season. Some activities, like guided tours or bike hire, may also require advance booking.
knowBeforeYouGo.fitness: A reasonable level of fitness is required for this trip, as it involves walking and potentially some swimming. Some trails can be steep and uneven.
